content.question: Which of the following best describes the function of the first paragraph?

choices.label: It previews the author’s line of reasoning by listing the main points of the argument.
It engages the audience’s sympathies by suggesting parallels between Rowling and her fictional hero.
It enhances the author’s credibility by relating a little known anecdote about Rowling’s early interest in fantasy fiction.
It captures the audience’s attention by presenting an imaginary scenario about how Rowling created Harry Potter.

content.answer: It engages the audience’s sympathies by suggesting parallels between Rowling and her fictional hero.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
